data.name: Dice Kingdoms
data.detailed_description:
Join our Discord


About the Game

Dice Kingdoms is a multiplayer turn-based strategy game where each player must develop their island and compete for victory through culture, military conquest or building an expensive wonder.

Build


  • Strategically prioritize what to build
  • Efficiently layout your city, anticipating attacks and diseases while optimizing for space

Harvest


  • Build specialized houses to have more dice
  • Use rerolls to try to get the resources you need the most but risk natural disasters

Combat


  • Automatic battles after choosing targets
  • Pillage of strategic buildings yields many resources
  • Use force to punish greedy development

Disasters


  • Natural disasters are determined by the number of skulls rolled
  • Some natural disasters affect yourself while some affect other players

data.short_description: Dice Kingdoms is a multiplayer turn-based strategy game where resource collection is based on dice. Build efficiently to quickly expand your kingdom. Roll dice to gather resources while risking natural disasters. Attack and defend while developing your kingdom to achieve victory!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel i3 or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel i5 or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
